alert.note: Alert for Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam County through 745 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Interlachen. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Hollister, Florahome, George`s Lake, Carraway and Mannville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
